Posts.Content: Hi, I have just been diagnosed with metastases from a previous breast cancer a year ago, to my lung, liver and brain. :cry: :cry: Can anyone out there help with diet cancer plans? Thank you so much
Posts.Title: Breast Cancer Metastases

Posts.Content: Thank you so much for your prompt reply. I am indeed trying to detox my body. Have completely changed my diet, to veggies, some organic, plenty of salads and fruit. Specially strawberries and grapes. I did update my diet change to my oncologist, but her answer was "If you fancy a roast chicken have it" Any help will be appreciated. Thanks again
Posts.Title: Breast Cancer Metastases
